sub_title: Microbiology |  Biotechnology | Research | Teaching | Scientific Writing
summary:
Hello, welcome everyone!

I am an experienced, high-skilled and self-motivated scientist with a demonstrated history of working in the microbiology and biotechnology field. Possessing excellent general communication skills, supervising, guiding groups and counselling, along with the ability to communicate complex information about scientific issues in an understandable form to different audience levels. Having multi-tasking and organizational skills, all of which are imperative when working closely with multidisciplinary groups. 

Possess the ability to fluently speak English and Portuguese as mother tongue. 
Level of Dutch: B1.

Email contact:
annapatricya@gmail.com
